posts.post_content:
I love that this kills fliers dead, I love that it deals handily with blue, I love that you get great value for ![1](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=1&type=symbol)![Green](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=G&type=symbol), I love that ![Green](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=G&type=symbol) is getting the efficient creatures it always should have had, and I love the alien-looking Freudian art...  
But why in Urza's name is this not a spider? This could have been the Spider tribe's ultimate anti-air defender following their long history of clearing the skies, why make it an Insect?

Posted By: RagingGoblinGrenade (5/1/2013 12:42:55 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
What is powercreep? Well this is the perfect example of it. We have an environment where [Delver of Secrets](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Delver of Secrets) is barely being run and they make this monstrosity. I understand him being a sup'ed up [Grizzly Bears](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name= Grizzly Bears) But at least make him cost ![Green](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=G&type=symbol)![Green](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=G&type=symbol) the fact that he costs ![1](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=1&type=symbol)![Green](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=G&type=symbol) is absurd. Then lets give him 4 abilities that basically hates Blue. Can't be countered might as well say **F.U. Blue**, Reach, Flash, and protection from Blue. Wow.   
  
I had this thing sprung on me and it was annoying. The fact that this thing blocks your 3/6 flier all day long and doesn't receive a scratch is ridiculous. Oh and for every green player who whines about Green not getting good creatures, look no more. This thing is hideous.
posts.html:
